message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.IR 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the design and application of controlled natural languages, which are relevant to several sub-fields of computer science. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as it specifically deals with natural language processing. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely categories as they involve the development of intelligent systems that can understand and generate natural language. cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is relevant as the paper discusses the use of CNLs to improve communication among humans. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also relevant as CNLs can be used to improve search and retrieval of information.
